Movie.Storyline: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.
Movie.Title: The Dark Knight

Movie.Storyline: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
Movie.Title: Inception

Movie.Storyline: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight must return to defend Gotham City against the enigmatic jewel thief Catwoman and the ruthless mercenary Bane as the city teeters on the brink of complete annihilation.
Movie.Title: The Dark Knight Rises

Movie.Storyline: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.
Movie.Title: The Prestige

Movie.Storyline: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
Movie.Title: Batman Begins

Movie.Storyline: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
Movie.Title: Django Unchained

Movie.Storyline: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
Movie.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1

Movie.Storyline: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
Movie.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

Movie.Storyline: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.
Movie.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

Movie.Storyline: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
Movie.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

Movie.Storyline: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.
Movie.Title: The Departed

Movie.Storyline: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
Movie.Title: The Wolf of Wall Street

Movie.Storyline: In 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding near-by.
Movie.Title: Shutter Island

Movie.Storyline: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.
Movie.Title: City of God

Movie.Storyline: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.
Movie.Title: X-Men: Days of Future Past

Movie.Storyline: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.
Movie.Title: Spirited Away

Movie.Storyline: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking home.
Movie.Title: Howl's Moving Castle

Movie.Storyline: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caretaker.
Movie.Title: The Intouchables

Movie.Storyline: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
Movie.Title: The Pianist

Movie.Storyline: Light years from Earth, 26 years after being abducted, Peter Quill finds himself the prime target of a manhunt after discovering an orb wanted by Ronan the Accuser.
Movie.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy

Movie.Storyline: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.
Movie.Title: The Lives of Others

Movie.Storyline: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
Movie.Title: WALLВ·E

Movie.Storyline: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.
Movie.Title: AmГ©lie

Movie.Storyline: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
Movie.Title: Toy Story 3

Movie.Storyline: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.
Movie.Title: Oldboy

Movie.Storyline: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.
Movie.Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

Movie.Storyline: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
Movie.Title: Snatch.

Movie.Storyline: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
Movie.Title: Inglourious Basterds

Movie.Storyline: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.
Movie.Title: A Separation

Movie.Storyline: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
Movie.Title: Gran Torino

Movie.Storyline: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
Movie.Title: Million Dollar Baby

Movie.Storyline: By tying thousands of balloons to his home, 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years younger, inadvertently becomes a stowaway.
Movie.Title: Up

Movie.Storyline: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.
Movie.Title: Downfall

Movie.Storyline: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.
Movie.Title: Like Stars on Earth

Movie.Storyline: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
Movie.Title: Pan's Labyrinth

Movie.Storyline: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
Movie.Title: The Hunt

Movie.Storyline: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".
Movie.Title: 3 Idiots

Movie.Storyline: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.
Movie.Title: The Secret in Their Eyes

Movie.Storyline: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision corner with his older brother.
Movie.Title: Warrior

Movie.Storyline: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.
Movie.Title: V for Vendetta

Movie.Storyline: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
Movie.Title: Rush

Movie.Storyline: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
Movie.Title: A Beautiful Mind

Movie.Storyline: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
Movie.Title: How to Train Your Dragon

Movie.Storyline: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
Movie.Title: Into the Wild

Movie.Storyline: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
Movie.Title: 12 Years a Slave

Movie.Storyline: The true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.
Movie.Title: Hotel Rwanda

Movie.Storyline: A young woman from England comes to India to make a documentary about her grandfather's diary which was written in the 1920s about the Indian Independence with five young men.
Movie.Title: Colour It Yellow

Movie.Storyline: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous Hungarian hotel between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
Movie.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

Movie.Storyline: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
Movie.Title: No Country for Old Men

Movie.Storyline: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
Movie.Title: Finding Nemo

Movie.Storyline: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
Movie.Title: Mary and Max

Director.Name: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino

Movie.Storyline: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
Movie.Title: Sin City

Movie.Storyline: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history, and fulfill their mother's last wishes.
Movie.Title: Incendies

Movie.Storyline: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
Movie.Title: There Will Be Blood

Movie.Storyline: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superheroes to save the planet from Loki and his army.
Movie.Title: The Avengers

Movie.Storyline: A drama based on the true story of a college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.
Movie.Title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale

Movie.Storyline: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
Movie.Title: How to Train Your Dragon 2

Movie.Storyline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
Movie.Title: The Bourne Ultimatum

Movie.Storyline: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.
Movie.Title: Donnie Darko

Movie.Storyline: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
Movie.Title: Infernal Affairs

Movie.Storyline: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.
Movie.Title: The King's Speech

Movie.Storyline: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.
Movie.Title: Her

Movie.Storyline: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
Movie.Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

Movie.Storyline: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.
Movie.Title: Ip Man

Movie.Storyline: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.
Movie.Title: Before Sunset

Movie.Storyline: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
Movie.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

Movie.Storyline: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers...
Movie.Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India

Movie.Storyline: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.
Movie.Title: Swades

Director.Name: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich

Movie.Storyline: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.
Movie.Title: Monsters, Inc.

Movie.Storyline: In 1986, in the province of Gyunggi, in South Korea, a second young and beautiful woman is found dead, raped and tied and gagged with her underwear. Detective Park Doo-Man and Detective Cho...<a href="//m.imdb.com/title/tt0353969/plotsummary?ref_=m_tt_ov_pl">
Movie.Title: Memories of Murder

Movie.Storyline: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.
Movie.Title: The Help

Movie.Storyline: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.
Movie.Title: The Raid 2

Movie.Storyline: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.
Movie.Title: Slumdog Millionaire

Movie.Storyline: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.
Movie.Title: Elite Squad: The Enemy Within

Movie.Storyline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
Movie.Title: Blood Diamond

Movie.Storyline: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.
Movie.Title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
